card_text: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for two halves of a gigantic creature, reveal them, and archive them.

card_text: Play: Give a flank creature three +1 power counters. Give its neighbor two +1 power counters. Give the second creature’s other neighbor a +1 power counter.

After Reap: Gain 1 for each other friendly Beast creature.
Omni: Heal 1 damage from each friendly creature.
flavor_text: “Don’t lick the roof unless you’re planning to stay a while.” —Dodger

card_text: Action: Choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, that creature loses taunt and elusive.

card_text:

flavor_text: It’s more of a taking tree.
